name: Game Of Death - Real Adventure
description:
KILL ZOMBIES!

Do you and your friends ever talk about what would happen if the world really became taken over by zombies? What weapons would you want to use to defeat them!?

Now you can be prepared for all the zombies! Kill Zombies gives you an arsenal of Gunship helicopter, right on your iPhone! Use all of the weapons and fight off the zombies! Fun for kids and adults. A must have for all zombie fans! Features all types of interactive weapons with realistic sounds and visual effects! Addicting sick fun!

KILL ZOMBIES!
